acupoint.standard_location: 在小腿内侧，当足内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后方
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the medial side of the lower leg, 3 cun above the tip of the medial malleolus, posterior to the medial border of the tibia
acupoint.simple_method: 内踝尖向上四横指（3寸），胫骨后缘凹陷处
acupoint.simple_method_en: Four finger-widths above the inner ankle bone, just behind the shin bone.
acupoint.anatomical: 在胫骨后缘和比目鱼肌之间；有大隐静脉，胫后动静脉；布有小腿内侧皮神经，深层后方有胫神经
functions: 健脾化湿 (strengthen spleen, transform dampness)
滋阴补肾 (nourish yin, tonify kidney)
acupoint.caution: 孕妇慎用 (Use with caution in pregnancy)
